alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton County through 745 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blue Mountain Lake, or 11 miles northwest of Indian Lake, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail and heavy raib. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blue Mountain Lake, Forked Lake Public Campground, Lake Eaton Campground, Lake Durant Campground, Long Lake, Hasbroucks, Eagle Nest, Woods, Quaker Beach, Little Tupper Lake and Deerland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
